DOC.brief_summary: This study last 9 week . Subjects visit clinic 14 time . Certain clinic visit include physical examination , lung function test , inflammatory cell analysis nasal secretion and/or sputum , blood draw . Subjects inhale FDA approve virus nose know cause common cold . All study relate medication medical examination provide cost subject . The drug use study approve age group study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of RV-39 In Patients Who Also Have Asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Have asthma least 3 month prior study . Have use allow prestudy asthma therapy least 3 month prior study . Demonstrate airway hyperresponsiveness follow inhalation bronchoconstrictor . Have positive allergic status antibody test . Have history lifethreatening asthma . Been hospitalize asthma within 24 month prior study . Have certain condition would make study participation unsafe . The study doctor evaluate inclusion exclusion criterion .
